title: help
body: How come i dint havce silver border i got silver 4 in s7 and s8 i dont ahve anything

replies.body: I checked up on your account and it looks like there was a 2 week ban applied for toxicity, which would have disqualified you from any ranked rewards for last season. If you don't remember what happened or why it warranted a punishment you can always reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
